L

lock(K) - Method in class net.dapete.locks.Locks
Return a Lock (of type Locks) already locked using Lock.lock().
Locks<K,L> - Class in net.dapete.locks
Key-based locking with implementations of Lock.

N

net.dapete.locks - package net.dapete.locks
This package contains classes for key-based locking, as in a way to obtain Locks or ReadWriteLocks which are identified by a key.

R

readLock(K) - Method in class net.dapete.locks.ReadWriteLocks
Return a ReadWriteLock (of type ReadWriteLocks) where the ReadWriteLock.readLock() is already locked using Lock.lock().
ReadWriteLocks<K,L> - Class in net.dapete.locks
Key-based locking with implementations of ReadWriteLock.
